## Some times the in-class quiz does not go so well ...

Lets take a look at a few transactions

## Hints

+ Identify the transaction type first.
+ If you worked the flash cards, you this is easy.
+ Make sure your balance sheet balances.  
+ If you have only one arrow on the balance sheet, it is wrong.
+ Follow the echo and get it categorized
    + Income statement changes show in Cash from operations
    + Asset changes show in cash from investments
    + Liability and Owner Equity Changes show in cash from finance
